sentences.en: All you can do to prevent potato blight is keep an eye on your crops.
sentences.cn: 为预防马铃薯枯萎病你惟一能做的就是留意你的庄稼。

sentences.en: Bankruptcy was the blight of the family.

sentences.cn: 疫病在加利福尼亚内部谷地的核桃幼树上通常不很严重.

sentences.en: Chestnut blight is one of most serious diseases of chestnut world widely.
sentences.cn: 板栗疫病是世界性栗树病害之一.

sentences.en: He says it is possible to grow potatoes that resist late blight.
sentences.cn: 他说,种植能够抵抗晚疫病的马铃薯是可能的.

sentences.en: His absence cast a blight over the family.
sentences.cn: 他的不在场使家庭笼罩上一层阴影.

sentences.en: Manchester still suffers from urban blight and unacceptable poverty.
sentences.cn: 曼彻斯特仍然受到城区脏乱和严重贫困问题的困扰。

sentences.en: One example is the needle blight.

sentences.en: Stem blight of broad bean is an important disease in Yunnan Province.
sentences.cn: 蚕豆细菌性茎疫病是云南蚕豆上的重要病害.

sentences.en: Such a blight was fallen over my literary career.
sentences.cn: 我的文学生涯受到极大挫折.

sentences.en: The apple crop was wiped out by blight.
sentences.cn: 枯萎病使苹果全无收成.

sentences.en: The killer mould behind potato blight has a giant genome, say scientists.
sentences.cn: 科学家称,导致马铃薯疫病的霉菌有一组巨大的基因.

sentences.en: There is a blight on all his efforts.
sentences.cn: 他的一切努力都遭到挫折.

sentences.en: These beetles are a blight to cotton.
sentences.cn: 这些甲虫是棉花的大害.
